name: Slender: lost soul
description:
Slender: lost soul - the most scariest horror game brought to you by WaterMark.

If you love the scary myth Slender Man; then the time is finally now for an arcade game worth playing!

BREAKING NEWS! Due to popular demand we have as promised released version 2.0! This has a new map (Orphanage), bonus features, and also a built-in Slender pages drawer!

Featuring:
• Heart-pumping scariest 3rd-person arcade game
• Different levels of survival outcomes
• Specifically composed original horror music
• Collect items for Easter Eggs
• Unlock Slender pages and maps
• Unique storyline
• Retina screen supported
• GameCenter leader boards
• New level (orphanage)
• Slender pages drawer


Slender Man is a well known myth of a tall slim man without a face. He has no eyes - but always watches you. Sometimes he stands and stares, but at other times he follows. You must keep moving - don't stop.

Players use a flash light to reveal a small section ahead, whilst hearing the scary music we composed specifically for this game. The music gets more intense as more items are found. Once you find the key, you may escape but your survival outside depends on the number of items found. As a general rule of thumb - don't look or it takes you.

GOOD LUCK!

IMPORTANT: To enhance gaming experience, earphones are recommended in order to hear our specifically designed horror music and sounds. Speaker volume can be an alternative but with sub-optimal effect. Please note our music cannot be reproduced and is under copyright of Kakoon Productions.
